question:
1. write a procedure text :
AKL ( how to make a label)​

related_questions.question: Taj mahal of india is...than candi prambanan of indonesia

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Taj mahal of india is bigger than candi prambanan of indonesia

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk komparatif dengan kata sifat (Adjective) satu suku kata sehingga untuk membentuk komparatif harus ditambahkan akhiran -er, menjadi is bigger than. Jawaban tidak mutlak is bigger than, tetapi bisa juga is smaller than atau kata lain yang dianggap lebih sesuai dan lebih valid berdasarkan data pengukuran matematis.

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
35. If you called me, I would see you. This means    A. I will not see you so you don't call me.
B. You call me and I don't see you.
C. You don't call me so I don't see you
D. I see you but can't reply you.
E. I see you but you don't call me.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

d. I see you but can't reply you.

Penjelasan:

aku melihat mu tapi tidak bisa menjawab mu

kena dia cma mau nengok

Jawaban:

C. You don't call me, so I don't see you

Penjelasan:

Semoga Membantu

Follow juga yaw :v
